name: MIMIC
description:
WHO CAN YOU TRUST?

Uncover the mystery behind a species of creature which takes the form of the ones around you.

Play as a protagonist as he unwillingly learns the truth and suffers the repercussions.

MIMIC is a first person, psychological horror game featuring third person action-puzzle elements. Chat with your friend Luke to uncover more about the mythical MIMIC and take care of any disturbances that take place around the house. Just be careful not to wander too far into the basement..

Created using the Unreal Engine 5™ engine.
